title: About. Damn. Time!
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/5bff20052803ea36940761b590780980.png

Re-rolling skins OP.

Now I need 2 gemstones for the next Vayne skin.

https://i.gyazo.com/f2ba7a2a14d3ee87d27194efaea13720.png

If anyone's curious, I spent $470 on chests.

replies.body:
ITS SO PRETTY. I have two gemstones not having spent any money, I'm so far away :(

As much as I love the Vayne skin I'm a supp main so I play Annie more so she's first :3

Congrats on finally completing your collection once more!

ive had 6. rerolled them

stuff annie
lel. I opened 7 boxes in total a month or two after this came out, got Hextech Annie skin shard. Rip peeps who spend money
and i got all the ultimate skins

I've been ultra lucky with mystery skins and shards in general.

I got Hextech Annie from a random S chest I got for a Vayne game. Had to spend $20 on chests to get the essence to unlock her lol.
i love this skin i got it a while back the vayne one tho well lets just say ill be getting the ward skins before i even think about her skin vayne is like a meh champ

Pretty sure you get the Vayne skin through gemstones and the Ward skins through essence and shards. So theres no need to prioritise either. ;)

And she's hardly 'meh' having the highest consistent pick rate of any champ, having the highest damage output in the game, being an ADC and an Assassin (thats like having a fire AND water type pokemon). Not to mention invisibility and a stun. 

I really dislike Vayne (because I'm usually on the receiving end of that bs), so god forbid me defending her, but she certainly isn't 'meh'

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NEWuKVI3,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-06-17T03:14:01.133+0000)
>
> Pretty sure you get the Vayne skin through gemstones and the Ward skins through essence and shards. So theres no need to prioritise either. ;)
> 
> And she's hardly 'meh' having the highest consistent pick rate of any champ, having the highest damage output in the game, being an ADC and an Assassin (thats like having a fire AND water type pokemon). Not to mention invisibility and a stun. 
> 
> I really dislike Vayne (because I'm usually on the receiving end of that bs), so god forbid me defending her, but she certainly isn't 'meh'

I think LordCreep's referring to the upcoming Hextech Ward Skin, which will be available for 5 Gemstones: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fnE5mRe3nDY

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NEWuKVI3,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-06-17T03:14:01.133+0000)
>
> Pretty sure you get the Vayne skin through gemstones and the Ward skins through essence and shards. So theres no need to prioritise either. ;)
> 
> And she's hardly 'meh' having the highest consistent pick rate of any champ, having the highest damage output in the game, being an ADC and an Assassin (thats like having a fire AND water type pokemon). Not to mention invisibility and a stun. 
> 
> I really dislike Vayne (because I'm usually on the receiving end of that bs), so god forbid me defending her, but she certainly isn't 'meh'

nah man reason why she is meh is because as a champion she is boring to play and lane against and if people are having issues with her invis just you know red trinket lol but i get what you mean but i rarely run into an issue with vayne i have more issues against lucian and mf atm

Congrats!

I've only got like 4 gem stones atm....one day I will get there.
Congrats on throwing an inordinate amount of shekels your way, you mean?
Yea cos Im sure Maraudaur gets every penny aye.

Congrats!

I have 1 gemstone, but I'm in no particular hurry to get Annie or Vayne skins

if it was Azir or Aurelion Sol however.. then it would be another matter entirely...

I can understand you spending this much on the skin, but anyone else just pisses me off. They spend like 400-500 dollars on this thing just for one skin that after you have it becomes old pretty fast. It's a cool skin and all, but if you compare costs this is only a 975 or PERHAPS 1350 quality skin. 

Then again if they were to release a "mythic" skin for Sion, I would probably spend that much money too.

Ive had about 9 gemstones but made them into chests and keys because...... i hate annie lol

Spent about 150 on  chests and keys so far
